text: Counterplan () is a 1932 Soviet drama movie directed by Sergei Yutkevich and Fridrikh Ermler.Госпрограмма празднования 100-летия It stars Vladimir Gardin, Mariya Blyumental, and Tatyana Guretskaya. ==Actors== * Vladimir Gardin - Babchenko * Mariya Blyumental - Tamarina * Tatyana Guretskaya - Katya * Andrei Abrikosov - Pavel * Boris Tenin - Vasya * Boris Poslavsky - Skvortsov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1932 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Yutkevich Category:Movies directed by Fridrikh Ermler Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Counterplan (movie)
